meanings.definition: A person who sells tobacco and tobacco-related products.
meanings.sent1: The tobacconists in the store were friendly and knowledgeable about different types of tobacco.
meanings.sent2: I need to visit the tobacconists to buy some cigarettes for my uncle.
meanings.sent3: The tobacconists joked that they were 'smokin' hot' when they sold a lot of cigars.
meanings.sent4: The tobacconists were the wizards of the tobacco world, knowing all the secrets of the trade.
meanings.sent5: The tobacconists' shop was filled with the rich aroma of various tobacco blends.

meanings.definition: A shop or store that sells tobacco and tobacco-related products.
meanings.sent1: I always buy my cigars from the tobacconists down the street.
meanings.sent2: The tobacconists' shop had a wide selection of pipes and tobacco accessories.
meanings.sent3: The tobacconists' store was so popular that it was always packed with customers.
meanings.sent4: The tobacconists' shop was a treasure trove for tobacco enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The tobacconists' store window displayed the latest tobacco products enticingly.
